recipe_text: Quantity; 200; Prepare 200 grams of canned tuna, drained| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of lime juice| Measurement; 15; Measure out 15 grams of olive oil| Measurement; 50; Measure out 50 grams of red onion, finely chopped| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of cilantro, chopped| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of salt| Measurement; 1; Measure out 1 gram of black pepper| Quantity; 4; Prepare 4 tostada shells| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of avocado, sliced| Untimed; None; In a bowl, combine tuna, lime juice, olive oil, red onion, cilantro, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Spread the tuna mixture evenly over the tostada shells| Untimed; None; Top with avocado slices| Finish; None; Serve immediately and enjoy!
title: Tuna Lime Tostadas
